Agenda

Major points

  • Short term goals including making Trac tickets for them.
  • License discussion
  • Invite everybody to join in game tomorrow for the blender conference at 12:00 CEST (GMT +2).
  • Discuss the things below

Things to discuss

  • Settings
    • Talk:Death
  • Code
    • Code cleaning (azaghal)
    • Coding guide line including style, commenting.
    • Implementing the rest of the *Manager for data loaders. (azaghal)
    • Cleanup that build bundle you have now - as someone noted, lots of it is still unneeded. (azaghal)
    • <@azaghal> I'd also suggest switching to std::* stuff on server, but PK will PK me ;) <Levia> partly agree on this one.

Attendees

(Those who said something)

  • azaghal
  • CyaNox
  • Eklina
  • g_remlin
  • Induane

  • Levia
  • loptosk1

Licenses

  • For code we use GNU GPL v2 or later
  • For art we use CC-BY-SA version 3
  • For documents we use GNU FDL

Decisions

Code

  • Azaghal is going to make trac tickets about what needs to be cleaned/moved and/or do it himself.
  • Azaghal offered to monitor code commenting (This is an ongoing task).
  • Sueastside and Azaghal (maybe PK?) will work on some guide lines for code style and naming conventions.

Settings

  • Player death is permanent
  • We will have aging.

The rest

The rest of the Agenda has been moved to the meeting next week: Meetings/20-10-2007

IRC log Meeting started at around 20:01:17 and ended around: 22:13:00.
